attributes.action: Let's be the change we wish to see and get meditation taught in schools
attributes.additional_details:
The internet is full of articles to back this up but reach deep down inside yourself and think for a moment could this be worth a try? 

Please join me in this petition
attributes.background:
"If every 8 year old is taught meditation, we will eliminate violence from the world within one generation." - Dalai Lama ...

Got to be worth a try isn't it ?

The benefits of meditation are far reaching bud sadly only really explored when we reach adulthood, in some cases as a last resort
